title: ContainerContent
description: The file is a container for other information.

filesContainer.description: If this file is an archive (containing multiple files), put the metadata of the contained files here.

timeSeriesContainer.description: If this file contains time series data, put the metadata of the contained topics here.

otherInformation.description: If this file contains other structured information (e.g. CSV headers or JSON schema), store it here.
